cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ DLat → c0 ∈ Lat)
⊣ d(hs2,(Base ` c0))
⊣ d(hs2,(meet ` c0))
⊣ d(hs2,(join ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdlat), wcel(c0, clat))

cumulated.pretty:

⊣ d(hs2,(meet ` c0))
⊣ d(hs2,(join ` c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cdlat), wcel(c0, clat))
-| diffsc(hs2, cfv(cjn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ DLat → c0 ∈ Lat)
⊣ d(hs2,(join ` c0))

cumulated.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cdlat), wcel(c0, clat))
cumulated.pretty: ⊢ (c0 ∈ DLat → c0 ∈ Lat)

comment: A distributive lattice is a lattice. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 30-Jan-2015.)
